title: Components of Flowchart
text: In the books of science and maths, we have seen diagrams Similarly, we make a diagram which shows the solutions of a problem There are some components in the diagram which have fixed meanings For example, whenever we draw a flowchart, it will start with a start block We call it a block And we will end it with an exit block This block is an oval shaped egg-shaped block In which I have written a start So, my solution starts from here and ends at the exit Apart from this, we have a parallelogram shape Which is used for input or output What does input and output mean? For example, we all must have used Google Chrome on our phones You must be using Google Chrome or Safari If you have a Mac or Apple device Or there must be some students who use Microsoft Edge Or browsers must be used to search for things So, how does a browser work? A browser works by typing any word in it For example, I have typed the word, my college So, the browser gives me the meaning of any word Or it gives me related links Or it gives me many other things Now, what is the job of a browser? Whatever input is given in it, like whatever we write on it On the basis of that, we have to give some output So, input is anything that is taken After that, Google Chrome must have written some code of millions of lines It will run that code and on the basis of that, it will produce some output It will show us some websites and some meanings Similarly, all the C++ codes that we have There will be some input and some output Input and output can be anything For example, if I have to calculate the sum of two numbers If I want to do something like this Sum is equal to A plus B So, I have to take A and B in the input So, these are my variables In math, these are called variables I have to take the value of these variables from the input block If I have to print this sum Then I have to give the statement of this also in the output block By writing print sum So, in this way, we use our parallelogram shape for input and output One more important thing Whenever we have to input or output a variable We will only write the name of the variable If I have to input the value of any x variable We will write input x It will not be understood now I completely understand But as we solve one equation We will understand it better For now, we have to focus on the theory Similarly, if I have to print x Then instead of input, I will write print x But if we have to print a fixed value Like this or like our college When we are printing such strings Then we generally write them with double quotes After that comes our process block Process block is basically a rectangle Process means any work Once the input is there, how does the code work? Code has a basic flow of working Let's suppose this is my box in which my code is written Code always takes some input Some process performs on it That means it does some work It can be a calculation It can be applying a math formula It can be any work After that, code always gives some output So all the work in between We consider them in the process So basically, our rectangle will be a process block Now what is happening here? Here in a variable named name We are storing Tony Stark This is a string This is a value This is a name Which we are storing in it In programming language, it is called assignment Assignment means Whenever you see equal to It means assignment in C++ Assigning things means Giving a value to someone So this value is Stored in a variable named name So here, assignment is being done For example, if we have to calculate the sum of two numbers Then A and B will come in the input We should have sum in the output But where will the value of this sum come? The value of this sum will be given by the process When we do the work of sum is equal to A plus B That means we have assigned this in the sum variable Which we will finally present in the output Apart from this, we have another important block Decision block The work of decision block is To tell for any question That it is yes or no Means is it true or false In decision block, generally we write like this Is means if we have to check anything Then we will check in decision block Decision means we will check in this diamond shape Like I have written here Is age greater than equal to 18? So there can be only two answers Either decision block will give me yes Or it will give no So generally what we do with decision block We draw arrows like this If yes, then do this work If no, then do the work ahead of this So in this way, our decision block works For example, we have a problem That we have to design a software for traffic police In which anyone can apply for their license So we have to check before the license application That whether that person's age is greater than equal to 18 If yes, then only he will be able to apply for the license If no, then he will not be able to apply for the license So in this way, there are many real life decisions Which we convert into coding form And finally we have arrows To connect all these blocks Because flow comes in flow chart So our logic flows from one place to another So to connect all the components We have arrows in between Which work as a connector Now this is the end of many theories Now next we will see a small problem After seeing this, all these theories will be clear in our mind

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: In the books of science and maths, we have seen diagrams

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Similarly, we make a diagram which shows the solutions of a problem

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: There are some components in the diagram which have fixed meanings

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: For example, whenever we draw a flowchart, it will start with a start block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: We call it a block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: And we will end it with an exit block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: This block is an oval shaped egg-shaped block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: In which I have written a start

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So, my solution starts from here and ends at the exit

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Apart from this, we have a parallelogram shape

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Which is used for input or output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: What does input and output mean?

chunks.text: For example, we all must have used Google Chrome on our phones

chunks.text: Or there must be some students who use Microsoft Edge

chunks.text: So, how does a browser work?

chunks.text: Or it gives me related links

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Or it gives me many other things

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Now, what is the job of a browser?

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Whatever input is given in it, like whatever we write on it

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: On the basis of that, we have to give some output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So, input is anything that is taken

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: After that, Google Chrome must have written some code of millions of lines

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: It will run that code and on the basis of that, it will produce some output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: It will show us some websites and some meanings

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Similarly, all the C++ codes that we have

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: There will be some input and some output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Input and output can be anything

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: For example, if I have to calculate the sum of two numbers

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: If I want to do something like this

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Sum is equal to A plus B

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So, I have to take A and B in the input

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So, these are my variables

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: In math, these are called variables

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: I have to take the value of these variables from the input block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: If I have to print this sum

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Then I have to give the statement of this also in the output block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: By writing print sum

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So, in this way, we use our parallelogram shape for input and output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: One more important thing

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart

chunks.text: We will only write the name of the variable

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Then instead of input, I will write print x

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Like this or like our college

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: When we are printing such strings

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Then we generally write them with double quotes

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: After that comes our process block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Process means any work

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Once the input is there, how does the code work?

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Code has a basic flow of working

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Let's suppose this is my box in which my code is written

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Code always takes some input

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Some process performs on it

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: That means it does some work

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: It can be a calculation

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: It can be applying a math formula

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: It can be any work

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: After that, code always gives some output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So all the work in between

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: We consider them in the process

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So basically, our rectangle will be a process block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Now what is happening here?

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Here in a variable named name

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: We are storing Tony Stark

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: This is a string

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: This is a value

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: This is a name

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Which we are storing in it

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: In programming language, it is called assignment

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Assignment means

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Whenever you see equal to

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: It means assignment in C++

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Assigning things means

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Giving a value to someone

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So this value is

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Stored in a variable named name

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So here, assignment is being done

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: For example, if we have to calculate the sum of two numbers

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Then A and B will come in the input

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: We should have sum in the output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: But where will the value of this sum come?

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: The value of this sum will be given by the process

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: When we do the work of sum is equal to A plus B

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: That means we have assigned this in the sum variable

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Which we will finally present in the output

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Apart from this, we have another important block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Decision block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: The work of decision block is

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: To tell for any question

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: That it is yes or no

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Means is it true or false

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: In decision block, generally we write like this

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Is means if we have to check anything

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Then we will check in decision block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Decision means we will check in this diamond shape

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Like I have written here

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Is age greater than equal to 18?

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So there can be only two answers

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Either decision block will give me yes

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Or it will give no

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So generally what we do with decision block

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: We draw arrows like this

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: If yes, then do this work

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: If no, then do the work ahead of this

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So in this way, our decision block works

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: For example, we have a problem

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: That we have to design a software for traffic police

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: In which anyone can apply for their license

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So we have to check before the license application

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: That whether that person's age is greater than equal to 18

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: If yes, then only he will be able to apply for the license

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: If no, then he will not be able to apply for the license

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So in this way, there are many real life decisions

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Which we convert into coding form

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: And finally we have arrows

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: To connect all these blocks

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Because flow comes in flow chart

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So our logic flows from one place to another

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: So to connect all the components

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: We have arrows in between

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Which work as a connector

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Now this is the end of many theories

chunks.title: Components of Flowchart
chunks.text: Now next we will see a small problem
